title: Trump Media & Technology Group Announces SPAC Merger with DWAC to Launch Truth Social
description: Digital World Acquisition Corp (DWAC) and Trump Media & Technology Group announced a definitive merger agreement valuing TMTG at $875 million initially, with potential earnouts of $825 million. DWAC stock surged 357% following the announcement as retail investors poured in, despite undisclosed pre-IPO negotiations between DWAC leadership and Trump dating back to February 2021.

sources.title: Trump SPAC shares DWAC soar on social media deal news
Trump Media's merger with DWAC gets regulatory nod. Trump could get a stake worth $4 billion
